description: From chrono- (“referring to time”) +‎ -tropic (“affecting, changing”), from Ancient Greek χρόνος (khrónos, “time”) +‎ τρόπος (trópos, “turn, direction, way”) +‎ -ικός (-ikós, “-ic”, adjectival suffix).

entries.meaning: (physiology) Of, relating to, or affecting the rate of muscular contraction, especially of the heart.
